duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct patient evaluations via secure video calls to determine eligibility for an emotional support animal (ESA) letter.
Assess patient information and make decisions on ESA letter eligibility based on professional judgment and established guidelines.
Navigate through patient evaluations efficiently and collaborate with scheduling team to manage appointments.
Adhere to ethical standards and maintain patient confidentiality.

education_certification.credential: Valid license as a Mental Health Therapist.
Experience in mental health therapy is preferred but not required.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Proficiency in using video conferencing platforms and web-based portals.
